title: Look At This Book!
description: Books can take readers many places and help them learn new things. Students will love to discover the many genres of books and their purposes as they read this fantasy story about a boy and his reading adventures. Look At This Book! can also be used to teach students how to determine cause-and-effect relationships and to visualize to better understand text.
meta: autobiography, biography, fantasy, informational, mystery, science fiction
Cause and Effect : Determine cause and effect
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word read

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
